channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Google Chrome Update Deadline—Now Just 72-Hours Away
item.description: The U.S. government’s recent emergency Chrome update warnings have September 16 and September 18 deadlines.

item.title: Banana Equivalents

item.title: Getting AI to do your work
item.description: That’s the first step, certainly. If you don’t, your boss will. The second step is to take the time you’ve freed up and do work that the AI can’t do.

item.title: When did we lose consciousness?

item.title: The Importance Of Value Chain Management In An Increasingly Regulated Global Economy
item.description: Executives who embrace this change can position their businesses to win in a century of geopolitical, climate, technological and social dislocation.
